name: Cemetery Warrior 2
description: Cemetery Warrior 2 3D is a first-person shooter. Working in the graveyard, it is difficult to stay mentally balanced. On each grave is not just a name, but a story behind it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 70 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
